data.meanings: fire, flame, heat, war, light, shine, sparkle, irritate, vex or provoke war.
data.sentence: The word نَارًا comes from the root ن و ر and is associated with the meanings: fire, flame, heat, war, light, shine, sparkle, irritate, vex or provoke war.
The word أَوْ comes from the root ا و and is associated with the meanings: or
The word مِنْهَا comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
data.sentence: The word قَالَ comes from the root ق و ل and is associated with the meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.

data.meanings: possessor/people of, one who recites, superintended/owner, inhabitants/family/people of house or dwelling.
data.sentence: The word لِأَهْلِهِ comes from the root ا ه ل and is associated with the meanings: possessor/people of, one who recites, superintended/owner, inhabitants/family/people of house or dwelling.

data.meanings: to be or become sociable, companionable, conversable, inclined to company or conversation, friendly, amicable, or familiar. To be or become cheered, or gladdened or cheerful, gay, or gladsome. To be or become at ease, or tranquil; without shrinking or aversion.
data.sentence: The word ءَانَسْتُ comes from the root ا ن س and is associated with the meanings: to be or become sociable, companionable, conversable, inclined to company or conversation, friendly, amicable, or familiar. To be or become cheered, or gladdened or cheerful, gay, or gladsome. To be or become at ease, or tranquil; without shrinking or aversion.

data.meanings: To know/possess, have knowledge of a thing, to know a thing with respect to it's internal or real state, informed/acquainted.. Knowledge of the secret internal state or as some say of secret internal circumstances or properties.. Also to try, prove or test things, having experience.. News/tidings/information/notification/narration/story/account.
data.sentence: The word بِخَبَرٍ comes from the root خ ب ر and is associated with the meanings: To know/possess, have knowledge of a thing, to know a thing with respect to it's internal or real state, informed/acquainted.. Knowledge of the secret internal state or as some say of secret internal circumstances or properties.. Also to try, prove or test things, having experience.. News/tidings/information/notification/narration/story/account.

data.meanings: to burn/scorch, become of a colour in which whiteness predominates over blackness. shihaab (pl. shuhub) - flaming fire, bright blaze/meteor, star, penetrating flame, shining star, brisk/sprightly, flame, brand, radiating or gleaming fire, shooting or falling star. shihaab al-herb - dauntless warrior, one who is penetrating sharp and energetic in war.
data.sentence: The word بِشِهَابٍ comes from the root ش ه ب and is associated with the meanings: to burn/scorch, become of a colour in which whiteness predominates over blackness. shihaab (pl. shuhub) - flaming fire, bright blaze/meteor, star, penetrating flame, shining star, brisk/sprightly, flame, brand, radiating or gleaming fire, shooting or falling star. shihaab al-herb - dauntless warrior, one who is penetrating sharp and energetic in war.

data.meanings: to ask or take fire, learn, teach, catch, get a light from another. qabas - burning stick, fire brand, burning brand. iqtabsa (vb. 8) - to take light from another.
data.sentence: The word قَبَسٍ comes from the root ق ب س and is associated with the meanings: to ask or take fire, learn, teach, catch, get a light from another. qabas - burning stick, fire brand, burning brand. iqtabsa (vb. 8) - to take light from another.

data.meanings: to warm at the fire, endure heat, to roast/fry/broil/burn.
data.sentence: The word تَصْطَلُونَ comes from the root ص ل ي and is associated with the meanings: to warm at the fire, endure heat, to roast/fry/broil/burn.
